037584D32CBC5D8D.title: I'm feeling pretty crushed right now.

display.title: The First Maceration
description: All good ore processing lines start with a crush, and in your case, you'll want to macerate either your &&5Raw Ore&&r, or your Ore blocks (if you're using &&dSilk Touch&&r!)

When you can make the large multiblock Miners, your ore yield is almost &&aquadrupled&&r further, and you won't need to macerate for the first step - the &&bLarge Miner&&r will output its ores as if they had been macerated.
